tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  advertisement_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE MediaContent (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  media_type VARCHAR(50),
  title VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  publish_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ad_id INT,
    media_content_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE advertisements (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_title VARCHAR(255),
    ad_description TEXT,
    ad_category VARCHAR(50),
    ad_photo_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE media_content (
    media_content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title VARCHAR(255),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    content_duration INT,
    content_url VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE UserInteraction (user_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(255), ad_id INT, media_content_id INT);
CREATE TABLE User (user_id INT, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE Advertisement (ad_id INT, ad_name VARCHAR(255), ad_type VARCHAR(255), ad_created_at TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE MediaContent (media_content_id INT, content_type VARCHAR(255), content_title VARCHAR(255), content_duration INT);
CREATE TABLE InteractionLog (log_id INT, user_id INT, ad_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(255), interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP);
